India a ten all albino expected to Guinness Book of Records

A people living in New Delhi, India is expected to create a Guinness World Record. The10 members of this family all suffer from albinism, will become the world's largest albino family.
ralph lauren
Champlain couple in India are albino, they get married and have six children, all inherited the disease, In addition, their son-in-law and grandson are also in patients with albinism, a man of white hair, white skin, vision poor.
polo ralph lauren
Man of the house Rosetta â€¢ Kaplan said he was born to be discriminated against and to make things difficult, it is hard to understand our native Indians. "Rosetta said. Later, he married with albino wife Mani. "Our parents think we both married the best, because we 'are the same'." Rosetta "Some people say if you marry an albino people, on behalf of luck and wealth, but such a thing has not happened yet in our possession. "
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net
Rosetta said albinism affect the very life, he and his wife living in difficult family so far are squeezed into a small house. "Everybody thought we were foreigners, and even told us that the English rarely When the Indians." Rosetta said.
GHD
Mani said, when her first child, the child inherited the disease, where the wife Rosetta. She once went to the hospital would like to remove the uterus, but the doctor just to see her scared, and immediately took her to get home. Mani in subsequent years in succession gave birth to other children, all albinos. "Now I think this is a gift of God." Manisaid.
Lisseur Ghd
Eldest son of Victoria A Iraqi Kaplan said, he is now to be able to find an albino wife, on the content.
www.lisseurghdfrance.net
It is reported that up to albinism world record of the patient's family 6. Guinness World Records organization said that the certification with the Kaplan family contact.

U.S. Attorney for overseas targeted killings of their own in

U.S. Attorney General Eric Holder said, any U.S. citizen to join the organization and its branch of the "base" of the United States constitute a looming threat overseas are likely to bear a fatal blow.
ralph lauren
Holder delivered a speech at Northwestern University School of Law: "Unfortunately, our country may continue to face the terrorist threat posed by its own citizens."
polo ralph lauren
"When these individuals to take up arms against the United States or to join al Qaeda and planning attacks compatriots, while the actual response is only one we must under the Constitution to take measures to stop them. Times of crisis, we can not sit, but also will not stand still. "
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net
Holder believes that the view of the terrorist activities, arresting one could launch deadly attacks on the U.S. terrorist is usually unrealistic. Therefore, the Government has the power to use deadly force to defend U.S. interests. "
GHD
He claimed that, before the implementation of such a fatal blow to the U.S. government will conduct a comprehensive review and to ensure to meet the three premises: targeted by attacks on the United States,; arrest of U.S. citizens is not feasible; action is consistent with the principles of war-related legal .
Lisseur Ghd
Statement by the Western media, which is the senior U.S. government officials for the first time publicly dispatched armed unmanned aerial vehicles to explain the legal basis for implementation of targeted killings of U.S. citizens abroad.
www.lisseurghdfrance.net
In recent months, U.S. drone killed three U.S. citizens overseas, including one of the key leaders of the "base" Arabian Peninsula branch Anwar Awlaki.

The U.S. intelligence agencies concluded that the Aoraki associated with the two attacks are U.S. Fort Hood base shootings in November 2009 and December of that year, Christmas airliner attempted bombings.

U.S. President Barack Obama praised the end of September last year killed Aoraki is a heavy blow to the 'base' the most active branch. However, he was no mention of "targeted killings" Aoraki "Tools" unmanned aerial vehicles.

Unofficial civil rights advocacy group the American Civil Liberties Union lawsuit apply to submit to a court in New York earlier this month asked the U.S. government publicly involved in the UAV overseas combat activities authorized by law to file, said the government should be open to involving the basic information of the targeted killings program .

In response to this request, Holder said: "Our enforcement powers are not limited to the battlefields of Afghanistan ... we are fighting with an opponent across borders. Government has a responsibility, protection of the rights of countries and people from terrorist threats."

Holder's defense can not convince all listeners. Some people believe that the targeted killings of U.S. citizens overseas do not meet the legal.

Russell Sherman, a Northwestern University law student, said the UAV air strikes would be "assassination". Holder kept a "circular argument" for the government to justify the same university linguistics expert Holder Healy said.

Hina Shamsi said: "Government in the case of legal standards and evidence provided to the court arbitrarily killed (U.S.) citizens, There is nothing to do so but also jeopardized the behavior of the American Civil Liberties, American Civil Liberties Union National Security Project Director. "

US aviation sister roaring aircraft crash caused chaos known

A cabin of American Airlines female flight attendants on the 9th before the flight that the aircraft malfunction, causing the cabin is a confusion, resulting in flight delays, the crew were injured.

"This is bloody murder

2332 American Airlines flight left the gate on the same morning, the taxi went to the runway, ready to fly from Dallas, Texas to Chicago, Illinois, the crew routinely introduced to the passengers safety instructions.

At this time, a female flight attendants in the cabin through the public address system call pilot, said the aircraft mechanical problems, had to return to the gate inspection.

Michigan passengers Laurie Graber sitting, the 9th row of the cabin with many passengers thought that the flight attendant accidentally open channel to talk with the pilots, "everyone laughed". Graber then hear the other crew members chipped in to confirm aircraft, passengers prepared to take off and attempt to placate the colleague.But female flight attendants roared to mention the plane crash, air carrier bankruptcy and terrorist attacks, the statement on and off. Finally, she said: "Well, you (the pilots) do not listen to me, I give up, the plane crash is not my business," recalled Graber, heard these words, "We looked to each other, want to know what had happened . "

Some of the passengers to the police. A crew, an improper value of the pilots and the number of passengers uniforms female flight attendants, and pressed her on the first row of seats in the cabin. Female flight attendants screamed: "This is bloody murder!" Dallas airport police boarding the troublemakers flight attendants and the incident was injured in a crew sent to the hospital.

Passengers lingering fear

After the incident, American Airlines to replace the entire unit, the flight delays 80 minutes after takeoff.

American Airlines spokesman Ed deny Mull Taylor, its aircraft there are security risks.Passengers at any time will not be dangerous ... (American Airlines) to apologize for causing inconvenience to passengers, to thank them for their patience and understanding.

This "episode" so many passengers fear. "We are very afraid," said Greg Lozano, who lives in Illinois Elmhurst passengers, "Fortunately we are not on the air, this is the thing I first thought."

Passengers Bei Sani Christa Kos, female flight attendants have been screaming until the police handcuffed and taken away from the cabin. "I can not put her screams erased from your mind ... I feel (the police) had spent a full 10 minutes to get the woman taken off the aircraft.

Sick flight attendants are not taking

Events in the investigation, American Airlines did not disclose the names of the trouble female flight attendants. Mull said Taylor, American Airlines this matter as a "health event", "confirm that the affected crew members to get proper treatment.

Some passengers said, told the flight attendants trouble others suffering from bipolar disorder, there is no medication prior to boarding; a lot of people boarding aware that the flight attendants quirky.

Passengers Whitney Baseler said: "we boarded the plane, she asked me on the seat next to the passengers 'We are not in Houston? Will fly where?' We thought she was joking ... before aircraft taxiing, she said aircraft to ensure that the security needs more tests, more tests can not take off. "

Cities in the United States, California was 70 million natur

Pacific Gas and Electric Company and San Bruno, California, on the 13th reached an agreement to compensation for damages of $ 70 million in 2010 natural gas pipeline explosion and property damage caused to the city.
ralph laurenuth of the city of San Francisco, near San Francisco International Airport. September 9, 2010, in a neighborhood of the city gas explosion, causing fires caused eight people were killed, the entire film blocks burned.
polo ralph laurens
Some people complain after the explosion occurred a few weeks ago, they had the gas company reports smell the taste of gas leakage, but this company did not take any measures.
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net
San Bruno City Mayor Jim Broin, 13, said that gas companies must be delivered within 30 days of compensation, the money will be used for the interests of the community as a whole to help them out of the explosion and fire caused the tragedy.
GHD
San Bruno City intends to establish a non-profit organization management and use of this compensation.
Lisseur Ghd
San Francisco Chronicle, "a review article, welcomed the agreement, but pointed out that money can not solve all the problems caused by the explosion. "Reconstruction ...requires not only the fresh asphalt and new pipeline ... on San Bruno, the reconstruction also includes soothe the public memory of trauma, and reshape the civic spirit."www.lisseurghdfrance.net

Israel was to refer to improper treatment of Palestinian min

The international charity organization Save the Children on the 13th in the West Bank reported that the most was the Israeli military seizure after the release of Palestinian minors are suffering from post-traumatic stress disorder.
alph lauren
Since 2000, more than 8,000 Palestinian minors have in the West Bank the army detained, some of whom also received a military court.
polo ralph laurens
The investigating officers recently visited the 292 who have been to the party detained and eventually released Palestinian minors.
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net
Save the Children consultant eya Abd-al-Lai quarter, 98 percent of respondents said they had been subjected to physical violence or verbal violence of the Israeli soldiers. More than 90 percent of respondents minors suffering from post-traumatic stress disorder, for example, afraid to leave home, anxiety, nightmares, bedwetting, etc..
www.lisseurghdfrance.net" target="_blank">GHD
According to data provided by the Palestinian human rights organization Defence for Children International, 2301 Palestinian minors last year, was detained in square. At this stage, there are 170 minors in custody.
www.lisseurghdfrance.net" target="_blank">Lisseur Ghd
Save the Children reported that the majority of Palestinian minors in custody for throwing stones at Israeli soldiers.
www.lisseurghdfrance.net" target="_blank">www.lisseurghdfrance.net
The army spokesman Arye Sha Lita told the Reuters reporter: "The 13-year-old Palestinian boy who sometimes threw stones at the Israeli side of civil or military vehicles. It sounds like these children are arrested by the Israel Defense Forces, but we do not understand , they are very violent.
